name: The Last Fort
description:
The Last Fort allows the player to place their fort on a tile based map. Once the fort is placed, economy starts generating. When enough economy is accumulated, the player can create units and send them to defeat the enemy fort while passively protecting their fort from attacks. 

There are three types of units in the game - soldier, knight, giant

Player units can attack enemy units on their way to the enemy fort, and vice versa. A well timed unit can change the outcome of the battle.. use your resources wisely!
